getPurchaseDataError: There was an issue loading subscription or purchase data. Please try again, restart the app, or get help in Settings.
purchaseError: There was an issue making the purchase. Please try again, or get help in Settings.
restorePurchasesError: There was an issue restoring purchases. Please try again, or get help in Settings.
updateWidgetError: There was an issue updating widget data so widgets may not display the correct data. Get help in Settings.
updateKeyboardError: There was an issue updating keyboard data so the Snippeta keyboard may not display the correct data. Get help in Settings.
themePreviewError: There was an issue previewing the theme. Please try again, or get help in Settings
loginError: There was an issue logging in. Please try again, or get help in Settings
getSnippetDataError: There was an issue loading snippet data. Please try again, restart the app, or get help in Settings.

errorCodes.0: There was an unknown server error.
errorCodes.1: There was an error on the server response.
errorCodes.2: There was an error in the server database.
errorCodes.3: This email address is already taken.
errorCodes.4: This phone number is already taken.
errorCodes.6: A purchase/subscription is needed to complete this function.
